block.p: In the latest of a series of takeover bids, Broadcom agreed yesterday to acquire the chip maker NewPort Communications. Broadcom will issue about 5.5 million shares of its Class A common stock in exchange for all outstanding shares of NewPort, which is privately held. The deal was worth about $1.32 billion based on Broadcom's closing price yesterday of $240.75, up $15.6875.
